channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Santa Tell Me
channel.desc: When Olivia finds a letter from Santa promising she'll meet the love of her life by Christmas Eve - and that his name will be Nick - she's stunned by three potential suitors.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Holiday Heritage
channel.desc: Join Ella, her mum and her grandma in this countdown-to-Christmas romcom, as three generations celebrate two holidays - Christmas and Kwanzaa - as one family.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Spirit Of Christmas Station
channel.desc: With a deadline looming, editor Isabell retreats to her family's cabin for inspiration. A local helps her revive the Christmas Festival and discover the ending to her own story.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: To All A Good Night
channel.desc: When a small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who is in town to buy her family's parkland, she may have inadvertently saved Christmas with him.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mistletoe In Montana
channel.desc: Cowgirl Merry has been unlucky in love, but is she right to hope that her fortunes have changed when single dad Mark gallops onto her ranch and lassoes her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Novel Noel
channel.desc: A book editor takes on a temporary gig running a bookstore, where her battles with the owner's son allow her to rediscover her passion for nurturing creativity.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mystery On Mistletoe Lane
channel.desc: Heidi discovers a Christmas mystery in her historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Never Been Chris'd
channel.desc: A complex love triangle forms after best friends Naomi and Liz head home for Christmas and reconnect with their secondary-school crush, Chris.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: When Danielle is left to raise her daughter after her husband goes missing and is presumed dead, she begins to tell her daughter bedtime stories of her father.
